column5: A small group of us are heading to Nestor Falls in late summer to fish Sabaskong Bay out of Nestor Falls.Looking to do some walleye fishing. Any places in that bay or tips on fishing for walleye in this water. Doesn't look very deep but have heard good things about this area.Thanks.Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
That time of year, many people are driving out west in search of bigger walleyes. I see a lot of Nestor boats towards Miles Bay later in the summer.
